languages.text: "Рада служить Вашей Светлости", {n}— Вигдис сгибается в низком поклоне.{/n} "В вашем подчинении на этом корабле находятся тысячи людей, сотни офицеров и руководителей. Моя служба осуществляет прием, обработку и отправку всей коммуникации с ними, а также — с внешними источниками. Я — ваши глаза и уста, Лорд-капитан".

"It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Рада служить Вашей Светлости", {n}— Вигдис сгибается в низком поклоне.{/n} "В вашем подчинении на этом корабле находятся тысячи людей, сотни офицеров и руководителей. Моя служба осуществляет прием, обработку и отправку всей коммуникации с ними, а также — с внешними источниками. Я — ваши глаза и уста, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

"It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

"It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

"It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

languages.text: “能为您服务是我的荣幸，大人。”{n}音阵大师向你深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}“您负责指挥这艘船上的几万名船员，以及数百名军官与部门负责人，而我负责接收、处理、发送你与他们之间的所有通信，也负责与外界进行通信。我就是您的眼睛与喉舌，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “能为您服务是我的荣幸，大人。”{n}音阵大师向你深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}“您负责指挥这艘船上的几万名船员，以及数百名军官与部门负责人，而我负责接收、处理、发送你与他们之间的所有通信，也负责与外界进行通信。我就是您的眼睛与喉舌，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「{mf|陛下|陛下}にお仕えできて光栄です」{n}ヴォクスマスターは深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「この船には何千人もの乗組員、何百人もの士官、セクションチーフがいます。私は、あなたと彼ら、そして外部とのすべての通信の受信、処理、送信を担当しています。私はあなたの目であり口です、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|陛下|陛下}にお仕えできて光栄です」{n}ヴォクスマスターは深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「この船には何千人もの乗組員、何百人もの士官、セクションチーフがいます。私は、あなたと彼ら、そして外部とのすべての通信の受信、処理、送信を担当しています。私はあなたの目であり口です、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Es ist eine Ehre, Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu dienen." {n}Die Voxmeisterin verbeugt sich tief.{/n} "Ihr habt an Bord dieses Schiffes Tausende von Crewmitgliedern und Hunderte von Offizieren und Sektionsleitern unter Eurem Befehl. Ich bin für Empfang, Verarbeitung und Senden der gesamten Kommunikation zwischen Euch und Ihnen sowie externen Quellen verantwortlich. Ich bin Eure Augen und Euer Mund, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist eine Ehre, Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu dienen." {n}Die Voxmeisterin verbeugt sich tief.{/n} "Ihr habt an Bord dieses Schiffes Tausende von Crewmitgliedern und Hunderte von Offizieren und Sektionsleitern unter Eurem Befehl. Ich bin für Empfang, Verarbeitung und Senden der gesamten Kommunikation zwischen Euch und Ihnen sowie externen Quellen verantwortlich. Ich bin Eure Augen und Euer Mund, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « C'est un honneur de vous servir, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}La maîtresse-vox s'incline respectueusement.{/n} « À bord de ce vaisseau se trouvent sous vos ordres des milliers de membres d'équipages et des centaines d'officiers et chefs de section. Je suis responsable de la réception, du traitement et de l'envoi de toutes les communications entre vous, eux, et toutes les sources extérieures. Je suis vos yeux et votre voix, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un honneur de vous servir, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}La maîtresse-vox s'incline respectueusement.{/n} « À bord de ce vaisseau se trouvent sous vos ordres des milliers de membres d'équipages et des centaines d'officiers et chefs de section. Je suis responsable de la réception, du traitement et de l'envoi de toutes les communications entre vous, eux, et toutes les sources extérieures. Je suis vos yeux et votre voix, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «Es un honor servir a mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}La maestra de vocos te hace una profunda reverencia.{/n} «A bordo de esta nave hay miles de tripulantes y cientos de oficiales y jefes de sección bajo su mando. Yo soy la responsable de la recepción, el procesamiento y el envío de todas las señales de comunicación entre ellos y usted, así como entre las fuentes externas. Soy sus ojos y su voz, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Es un honor servir a mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}La maestra de vocos te hace una profunda reverencia.{/n} «A bordo de esta nave hay miles de tripulantes y cientos de oficiales y jefes de sección bajo su mando. Yo soy la responsable de la recepción, el procesamiento y el envío de todas las señales de comunicación entre ellos y usted, así como entre las fuentes externas. Soy sus ojos y su voz, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne hizmet etmek şereftir." {n}Voks Üstadı yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Bu gemide emrinizde binlerce tayfa, yüzlerce subay ile bölüm şefi mevcut. Dış kaynaklar da dâhil olmak üzere onlarla aranızdaki tüm iletilerin alınması, işlenmesi ve gönderilmesinden sorumluyum. Gözünüz ve kulağınızım Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Vox Master offers a deep bow.{/n} "Aboard this vessel you have at your command thousands of crew members and hundreds of officers and section chiefs. I am responsible for receiving, processing, and sending all communications between you and them, as well as external sources. I am your eyes and mouth, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerine hizmet etmek şereftir." {n}Voks Üstadı yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Bu gemide emrinizde binlerce tayfa, yüzlerce subay ile bölüm şefi mevcut. Dış kaynaklar da dâhil olmak üzere onlarla aranızdaki tüm iletilerin alınması, işlenmesi ve gönderilmesinden sorumluyum. Gözünüz ve kulağınızım Lord Kaptan."
